Description of Data Value or Column Name: Date for which throughputs are reported
Day of month that data refers to
Legal entity that owns and operates pipeline
Name of pipeline system determined by corporate entity
Location along pipeline where throughputs are measured and reported, determined by corporate entity
The latitude coordinate at the key point where throughputs are reported
The longitude coordinate at the key point where throughputs are reported
The direction that natural gas flows through the pipeline at key point
Whether volume of natural gas is being imported, exported, or shipping intra-provincially.
The maximum amount of natural gas that the pipeline can theoretically move at a given time, measured in gigajoules per day
The volume of natural gas flowing though the pipeline at the Key Point indicated, in thousand cubic meters per day
The energy content of the natural gas flowing though the pipeline at the Key Point indicated, in gigajoules per day
